amendment.description: An amendment numbered 78 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding to the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas program by $5 million and reduces the General Services Administration's rental of space allocation by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kustoff (TN) amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Kustoff (TN).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kustoff (TN) amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.
